title: v1.6.3.5-v3 Documentation Update
details:
Updated Copilot instructions and agent files for v1.6.3.5-v3 release.

Key v1.6.3.5-v3 features documented:
- Self-Write Detection: WRITING_INSTANCE_ID, getWritingTabId(), getWritingInstanceId(), isSelfWrite()
- Background-as-Coordinator Architecture with new message types:
  - QUICK_TAB_STATE_CHANGE - Content script → Background
  - QUICK_TAB_STATE_UPDATED - Background → All contexts
  - MANAGER_COMMAND - Manager → Background
  - EXECUTE_COMMAND - Background → Content script
- New functions in background.js: handleQuickTabStateChange(), broadcastQuickTabStateUpdate(), handleManagerCommand(), executeManagerCommand(), quickTabHostTabs Map
- New functions in sidebar/quick-tabs-manager.js: quickTabHostInfo Map, handleStateUpdateMessage(), _sendManagerCommand()
- New in src/content.js: QUICK_TAB_COMMAND_HANDLERS, _executeQuickTabCommand()
- Firefox Spurious Event Detection: _isSpuriousFirefoxEvent(), _hasMatchingSaveIdAndTabCount()
- Enhanced Timer Logging: STARTED/COMPLETED/FAILED

Files updated:
- .github/copilot-instructions.md (15,187 bytes, under 15KB limit)
- .github/agents/quicktabs-*.md (all 4 files)
- .github/agents/copilot-docs-updater.md
- .github/agents/bug-fixer.md
- .github/agents/bug-architect.md
